resources.string: The supervisor that was originally set for this log has been deleted. Please set a new supervisor.
Note that if the ending time is before the starting time, it will be assumed that the drive went into the next day.
You did not enter a license number for this supervisor. Are you sure you do not want to save the supervisor?
For privacy reasons, the license number can be left blank.
Supervisor age must be over 21 and less than 117.
Choose your state, or \"Custom\" to enter your own goals. You can edit your goals before you save them, and afterwards. Enter 0 for any value you don\'t want to track.
Adverse Conditions Hours (e.g. night and/or poor weather):
Please add the supervisor that accompanied you by tapping the plus sign in the bottom right, and tapping "Add Supervisor"
Please choose a state in the Goals page before exporting your log.
Unable to export using the Maine format: could not save the PDF.
Unable to export log using the Maine format: an app that can open PDFs is required.
Unable to export log manually: an app that can open XLS files (i.e. spreadsheets) is required.
Welcome to Permit Log, the app that helps drivers with learner\'s permits record their driving hours!\n\nPlease view this tutorial in portrait mode.
Tap the orange button to add a new supervisor (someone who ALREADY has a license) or to manually enter a drive.
Before each drive, select the supervisor that is accompanying you here.
Then, tap the "Start Drive" button to start the timer.
When you\'re done driving, tap the "Stop Drive" button to stop the timer and the app will record the drive in the driving log.

Tap the menu button in upper-left corner to edit and export the driving log, edit info about the supervisors, and set your goals.

We hope you enjoy using Permit Log! And remember, don't use your phone while driving.
-Team Redundancy Team
You will be now be directed to the goals screen, to enter in the hours required to get your licence. If you don\'t want to set any goals, just press the back button.
Please connect to the Internet to sign in.
